What is Microservices Architecture?
options: Small processes that communicate over network to fulfill one goal

questions.question: What is an advantage of Microservices Architecture?
options: If any service goes down, rest of project remains unaffected

questions.question: What is a disadvantage of Microservices Architecture?
options: Resource wastage due to virtual machines

questions.question: Why are containers lightweight alternatives to VMs?
options: They share the host OS kernel

options: For Microservices Architecture, Different Environments, Versioning

options: Same environment in dev, test and prod

questions.question: What is the purpose of containers?
options: To create isolated environments that run consistently across platforms
